name: Manamune
tooltip:
Manamune

Cost: 2600
+15 Ability Haste
+35 Attack Damage
+400 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2% maximum mana.

UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an attack or ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 450 bonus mana.

Transforms into Muramana at +450 mana.
